column5: i can't seem to find the pike at simcoe.. any tips? i typically launch in keswick at harry's. seems like i only hook into bass or big rock bass. i've been using spinners and jerk baits.. in 5-10FOW with some weed cover & sand/rocks  i'm stumped... also quite the pike newbie too..  any help with would help!  please reply back here or even pm me thanks!
Your in the right waters,white spinner baits and X-RAP Perch bait.
doh....i don't have the perch x rap.. my gf told me to get it the other day.. but i went off and got another bait.. maybe next time when i drop by...  sure do love them xraps..
